participant_1.background:
I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else.
I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer.
i work in accounting.
i play many instruments.
I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.

participant_2.background:
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

content.text: Hello there!
Hey there, how's it going?
It's going well, thank you! How are you doing?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking.
That's good to hear! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to exercise, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I know what you mean, I have the same problem. But it's important to stay active, so I try to make the time for it.
Exactly! I love to spend time in my workshop, building furniture.
That sounds like a great hobby! I'm not very good at building things, but I enjoy it when I do it.
It's definitely a learning process, but it's so rewarding when you finish a project.
I can imagine! What's your favorite thing to build?
I love building tables and chairs. They're so functional and look great in my house.
That's awesome! I'm sure they look great.
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of them.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
I try to keep busy!
Me too! I have a lot of hobbies, too. I play a lot of instruments, and I love spending time with my dog.
That's great! I love dogs, too. I have a dog named Acara, and he's the best dog ever.
I bet he is! Dogs are the best.
They really are!
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
